short_title: South Asian Heart Health Awareness and Research Act of 2024

summary.text:
South Asian Heart Health Awareness and Research Act of 2024

This bill authorizes the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to award supplemental grants to states for heart-disease research and awareness among communities disproportionately affected by heart disease, including the South Asian population of the United States.
